mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id , emp_name , tel , mail , hire_date , expire_date , address , photo , department_emp_id , department_id , FIND_CODENAME(department_id) departmentName , FIND_CODENAME(emp_position) posName , 'ROLE_' || UPPER(department_id) auth , a.account_id , a.password FROM emp e INNER JOIN account a ON e.emp_id = a.emp_id WHERE a.account_id = #{id}
